alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln; Moore (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:59PM CDT until July 20 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 358 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lynchburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Winchester, Fayetteville, Lynchburg, Decherd, Cowan, Huntland, Tims Ford Lake, Sewanee, Anderson and Hurdlow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
